entry.message:
[DQC.US.0101.9538] The concept ifrs-full:DividendsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities appears in the financing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:DividendsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities is an operating item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow from operating activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9538 Rule version: 17.0.0 -
